member.name: T:System.Reactive.IEventStream
member.summary: Provides an observable stream of events that can be used for analysis.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.IEventStream.Push``1(``0)
member.summary: Pushes an event to the stream, causing any analytics subscriber to be invoked if appropriate.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.IEventStream.Of``1
member.summary: Observes the events of a given type.
